website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you want one large squishy, but it comes with both nice features and some durability concerns.
pros: A large squishy (5.5" x 6.7") with a cute panda design and ideal qualities – both slow-rising and soft, yet maintains its shape
Garners praise for the subtle, sweet smell
cons: A bit pricey, especially considering you get only one
A few reports of colors peeling

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft Panda!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year daughter love squishies. She's got so many of them but this cute panda is her favorite one. It's really big and thick and squishie. It's very good quality unlike some squishes that are very flat and tears easily. I will buy more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: TeslaZEV

customer_reviews.title: New best friend?
customer_reviews.text: This little dude is one of my greatest Amazon purchases to date. He is large, extremely slow rising, and smells like strawberries (albeit fake, sugary strawberries, but it's awesome nonetheless). As an anxious fidgeter it has been so helpful and stress relieving in so many situations. Yes, over time he is going to fade, crack, not rise as smoothly, etc., but that's to be expected with any product that takes repeated physical battery. My friends and family members mocked me relentlessly when I continued to show up with a fat, squishy panda in my purse every day. Now I have to hide him from them.
customer_reviews.author: Raptoriffic

customer_reviews.title: So cuuutte! My coworkers and I just could not ...
customer_reviews.text: So cuuutte! My coworkers and I just could not stop squishing it and smelling it! One star taken off for durability though, we may have squished it too much, but one of the ears is starting to come off already!
customer_reviews.author: Aziza C.

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing! It's perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! It's perfect! It's huge, really good quality, extremely squishy and very slow rising. Looks better in person than in photo. Is also larger than expected. My daughter was so happy! So happy in fact that we ordered a second one for her friend. They say it smells like grape.
customer_reviews.author: Dewdrop

customer_reviews.title: Stress reliever
customer_reviews.text: This giant panda is a two handed stress reliever. It is not a super slow re-sizer, but personally, if I want to squish something more than once, I am not going to have the patience to wait for a slow moving one to fully resize before I squish it again. I think it's the perfect squishiness and resizing speed. My teenager may not be entirely thrilled with the speed of resizing, so I might get to keep this one with me.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Grace

customer_reviews.title: I'm in Heaven!
customer_reviews.text: This squishy is HUGE! Just like the picture! I've ordered sooo many squishies from this seller in the past, and they all come so beautifully wrapped and cared for. Mine never come with any marks at all. I own over 30 squishies and this one knocked it out of the park. Nothing bad to say! This squishy will go fast! Get it before it does. Never stopped buying from this seller! Thank you for the wonderful squishies! I love the ram collection! I have them all!
customer_reviews.author: KippertheFerret

customer_reviews.title: Awful Smell and Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: So not exactly what I expected. First, the panda stinks SO bad. I can’t begin to describe it but it’s definitely not pleasant!! Second, it looks as if this squishy has been used for quite some time. The front is all wrinkled and there’s areas of discoloration. Also, some of the color has peeled from the seams. I would NOT recommend this at all. So disappointed because I was really looking forward to this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tamlin26

customer_reviews.title: !!WARNING!! KEEP AWAY FROM CHILDREN!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrific smell. Months later and it still smells just as bad. Daughter can't even play with it. It gave my daughter an unshakable headache for days afterwards... And I don't know for sure but my daughter's eyesight went south after coming into contact with the chemical being emitted from this. Could be a coincidence, could be the cause... Regardless, it has some pungent, head ache inducing chemical that never goes away. KEEP AWAY FEOM CHILDREN!
customer_reviews.author: Primer

customer_reviews.title: When I took it out of the bag it was dirty and had stuff on it put I hadn’t even ...
customer_reviews.text: It was smooched and I will not come back up. When I took it out of the bag it was dirty and had stuff on it put I hadn’t even touched it yet so now it is stained for some reason. It is kinda hard but is slow and smells good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Slow rise but not as slow as typical squishies. Larger than most squishies so maybe a decent trade off. Mildly scented. Unfortunately, on the first day, the color started coming off at the seam and an ear came off while a 10 year old was squishing it. I didn’t witness so not sure if she was being gentle or not. I heard squishies in general are surprisingly fragile.
customer_reviews.author: featherlashes

customer_reviews.title: small flaw but still love it
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 stars because this squishy is adorable and very soft and squishy but has a defect on his left ear . It looks like the white paint got on his black ear which is minor because I am using this as a prop for online teaching. How ever I did pay for this and expect it to be delivered to me free of flaws. Other then that the size is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Trina Randall

customer_reviews.title: Cute, not a cute smell, falling apart
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute idea and it is REALLY squishy and satisfying to squeeze. However, my 9 year old has had it for 6 days and barely played with it and it’s falling apart. See the photos. And also, when she opened it it smelled exactly like taco time tator tots! Everyone at her birthday party agreed. Deep fried food smell, not a sweet smell like advertised. This should be a dollar store item with the way it’s disintegrating. She still loves it though!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality is awful, ears and tail teared off only after one day of using. Also it is not soft and not slow rising at all. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Squishy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter's bday and she LOVES it! It is super soft and squishy and smells great too. It's just as described and arrived in perfect condition in a sealed product bag inside the shipping box. I'm very satisfied with this purchase and will buy more of these squishies in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: It's cute and smells fruity, but it arrived damaged. The squishy was completely smushed and deformed upon opening. Never fluffed out and remained squashed. Will be returning and my kiddos are super bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Pieces easily break off
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my 2 girls. After being squeezed a million times on Christmas morning they noticed cracks in the seams. By that night the cracks turned into full blown tears. This panda I bought is not missing both ears due to the cracks. Its a design flaw. My daughter cried because the ears are now gone and on the unicorn squeeshie the neck is about to fall off. Really bad design. If not meant for kids to squeeze then don't advertise it that way.
customer_reviews.author: CB1000RE

customer_reviews.title: SO SQUISHY
customer_reviews.text: This panda was meant for my friend but..... I kinda want one for myself. My friend really liked it. I just had to return it once (before the birthday party) because a bump on the head. Very minor though :). I probably could of just cut it off but, had to make sure it was perfect for my friend. Love the squish and the cute face!
customer_reviews.author: Dan'k

customer_reviews.title: Misshapened with funky smell
customer_reviews.text: Panda was delivered very misshapened and with a strange unpleasant smell. Was meant as gift for daughter, very disappointed. UPDATE: I decided to go ahead and give it to my daughter pre-holiday as I did not want to bother with the return process. First off, she did not care at all that is was a little wonky and she actually likes the weird smell. After about ten minutes of her trying different squishes, she was able to get it to a much better shape. I did not think it was possible to return it to its intended shape, it took a faithful 6 year old to get it straightened out. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg H

customer_reviews.title: Squishy soft and smells lovely
customer_reviews.text: So cute! My daughter loves it. She has had it a few weeks now and it is still in tact with no tears. It has added some of it's color bit is still nice considering her wear and tear on it. It is very soft and squishy and is soft rising I'd that is what floats your boat. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: MommyEmily

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it and it's super soft and has a nice scent. We've had this a couple years now and it has withstood time with some wearing/fading. It does tear easily but luckily my daughter is older and not as rough with her toys.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie B

customer_reviews.title: My little Girl loves this thing very happy I have it a chance to air out
customer_reviews.text: Edit: After sitting in a box till Christmas the Chemical smell has gone away and the defect on the back has popped out very happy I gave it a chance to air out.... Smells like chemicals and is deformed on the back. My little girl loves squishies and pandas I had high hopes for this..now I don't know if I even want to give it to her.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my husband, but ended up using it myself. It’s smells really good and it also has a really good squish to it, I love using this in between calls or video games. It’s also very adorable
customer_reviews.author: Princess_Zelda

customer_reviews.title: Soft companion
customer_reviews.text: Soft! This is my desk mate. I smush and smash while on lengthy calls from my desk. I’m a person that has to do something with my hands and this soft panda is a good tool to satisfy this kinesthetic person. I used one in a training class and liked so much that I ordered my own.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thurman

customer_reviews.title: Almost wonderful, but...
customer_reviews.text: I wanna start off by saying that this thing is my first real squishy, so my feelings on it may just be a 'me' thing. This thing is amazing- Soft, squishy, VERY slow rising, and it arrived in really good condition! It's tons of fun to just squish and squash this guy... But he smells absolutely horrid. A very toxic fake-strawberry smell that gets all over everything it touches and I cannot get it out. I've thrown him in the washer a couple of times and he still smells absolutely terrible, just now he's in worse condition. It would be five stars if not for the terrible smell.
customer_reviews.author: Strange Doorways

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Panda!!! A Must Get!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This panda is simply adorable! I have this habit of reading a bunch of reviews before buying something. There was a mix of bad and good quality. I was pretty worried that my panda would come dented or with defects. Luckily, IT DIDN’T!!! Came in 2 days, like stated, and came with no problems at all! Smells like cream and is certainly jumbo!! I was hoping that it would be VERY squishy, but was just squishy, nothing special. Overall, this is a must buy for any squishy collection!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A.

customer_reviews.title: An "ok" squishy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter. She was very excited when it came but then was disappointed. After just one squish the ears got defects. The squishy isn't that slow rising and it smells OK. It came with some sort of stain on the bottom. But the main thing she was disappointed about was the size because it looked much bigger in the image. In person its about the size of her hand. The squishy though is very cute. Overall, the squishy isn't the best or the worst it's just OK.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This panda is the best of the best
customer_reviews.text: This panda is the best of the best...we have gone mad for squishies and ordered a good number of them. This is the largest and best suited for my son’s two handed squeezing. He claims it strengthens his hands for baseball lol. It’s scent is right up ther with the Harry Potter cat and of all we’ve ordered these two are the best. Definitely order one without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Bay Area Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift, as it was purchased for a little girl’s Easter basket. It isn’t QUITE slow rise, but good enough for her! She loved it, and it doesn’t have a chemical smell, but more of a light cream smell. Smells delicious, honestly. Great quality, pretty durable and really cute! It’s pretty big, too!
customer_reviews.author: Dara Miller

customer_reviews.title: Smelly
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute, squishy, and sensory pleasing. They have a bit of a smell that is slightly unpleasant. The black on the ears is peeling off after only gentle use.
customer_reviews.author: kriddle

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: After two days of playing with the Panda, it is already starting to rip apart and the ears will break off soon.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: love the squishyness and it is large
customer_reviews.text: love the squishyness and it is large.... smells awful. airing it out right now. we'll see if the smell gets better. part of the reason we bought this brand because we had good luck with another purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Misscami71

customer_reviews.title: Quick rise sweet smelling cute
customer_reviews.text: First one was smashed and wrinkled, returned for a better one. Pretty quick rise, smells good but the ears have tears in them. Not enough time to return again. Gift recipient loved it regardless.
customer_reviews.author: KatieCooksandCrafts

customer_reviews.title: Not "cream scented"
customer_reviews.text: Most of the description of this panda squishy is true, It smelled of the plastic bag it came in when I received it. It has now been over a week since I have had it and it still smells of plastic. It is slow rising but not "very slow" rising as claimed.
customer_reviews.author: A. Angelo

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing, ordered two, one was ok, the other one was smashed to the extent that it took awhile to be what I paid for, no reason for this. You disappoint the person who gets that one. The product is not the same as the other one. Will never waste my money again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so happy to get this little guy sitting at the tree for her on Christmas. It’s really soft and pretty durable- normally my kids rip through these things pretty quickly but this one is still in perfect shape and it’s the one my daughter carries around with her.
customer_reviews.author: C. H.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Came all crunched up with wrinkles that didn’t get better when it was unpacked.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Pangelinan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome squishy!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy!! I ordered it for myself on a whim after I had surgery and love it!! Very nice feeling squishy (like memory foam in some mattresses), and nice and slow rising! Very cute. I am very happy with my purchase!! Also, mine doesn’t smell like strawberries or fruit like I think i heard some people say, but it doesn’t smell like anything really. Love this guy!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not a good quality
customer_reviews.text: This Squashy is really cute it has a nice squish on it . But it got holes on top of the squashy and on Top of the ears ,peeling with in 4 days of use.
customer_reviews.author: Praveen

customer_reviews.title: Not slow rising, Cheaply made product! Arrived today with a defect!
customer_reviews.text: It showed up today DAMAGED and it’s not slow rising like it is advertised. Disappointed to say the least. It also came in with a huge crease line down the front where the tear is. I can tell by the feel of it that it will tear easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It was bigger than I expected. You just want to squeeze it the moment you get it. The scent is very light, which it would be more scented. But it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find even one that is decent quality - don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: These pandas are really cute but the quality is so terrible. I needed about 20 for a school event and I’ve had to order twice as many just to get enough that are of decent quality. If I hadn’t already given some out I would have gone with something completely different because you never know if you will get one decent one in a box of 10!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M Baron

customer_reviews.title: Great size! Very Soft!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my Panda loving granddaughter. Great size and extremely soft. I loved it so much i ordered another one for my other granddaughter. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Fer stress relievin'
customer_reviews.text: The chemical smell is not that great. It's cracking after 1 days use. I took 1 star off for those reasons. It is a nice size, and slow rising.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy the Dog

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute squishy. It is a good quality slow-rise squishy. My only issue is that in my opinion it is too big to be comfortably played with. If you enjoy two-handed squishing then this is the squishy for you. Good product, just too big for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: My young girls love these squishes
customer_reviews.text: My two and six year old daughters love these squishes. Relatively inexpensive gift that they actually play with. The scent is not that strong.
customer_reviews.author: Thewalls

customer_reviews.title: Another popular gift...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our grand daughter....she specifically requested it by sending me the link. Sounds like it arrived in time for her birthday & she enjoyed getting it. It was as promised.
customer_reviews.author: 67Cat

customer_reviews.title: Had to throw away
customer_reviews.text: Smelled funny, and the odor wouldn't go away even after airy it out for days. Had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: "Love Aolige Brand Squishies!!"
customer_reviews.text: Love 'Aolige' brand, squishies!! Have ordered several of them, recently & have been pleased with each & every one of them. Well made, no flaws & always as described. Give them a try, I think you'll be pleased!! I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: CaitlinP

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When product arrived one of the ears was slightly torn and just kept getting worse now that you fell off and she’s devastated it smelled nice and she was thrilled with it excepted the year was torn
customer_reviews.author: GmaVicki

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: It was NOT as slow rising as others we have purchased from the store. It arrived with defects like weird dimples , one on the front and one on the back. I am not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: mary hanley

customer_reviews.title: Came permanently squished
customer_reviews.text: Panda came permanently squished. We thought it would inflat but it's been over 24 hours and it's still in the exact same squished condition as when we opened it. Very dissapointed, as it was supposed to be a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Garbage quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my little sister when she was in her squishy phase and it was the biggest disappointment. She was so excited about it but the face rubbed off and the ears broke off 10 minutes after she opened her gift.
customer_reviews.author: thejoyfultribe

customer_reviews.title: Didn't tear the1st day like alot of them.
customer_reviews.text: I know how popular these squishies are but it's hard to get the right one. I recommend this one. Pkg nicely. Good size. Some say jumbo size and they are not. Like the Koala bear rainbow one. Very small and not made well. That's all. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: LBHurley

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to the collection
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is requested squishies for Christmas and this one is very cute and a nice size. Plus she loves pandas.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Dude

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and soft
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this adorable little Squishie. It is very soft and reinflates very quickly. Fun to hold and squish!
customer_reviews.author: Chrisitne M

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Not as squishy as expected and cracked in a weak.
customer_reviews.author: Slk

customer_reviews.title: Cute but damaged
customer_reviews.text: Cute little panda but came with some of the foam missing on the ear and looks like knife marks in the body causing holes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable
customer_reviews.text: The squishy is nice and big as well as very cute. The main problem I had with this is that it is not slow rising at all. The foam rises back up extremely quickly, in fact. Mine also came with a dent in its face. Not really a bad product, but not really worth the money either.
customer_reviews.author: Eden Enholm

customer_reviews.title: GREAT stress reliever, on-time and packed well
customer_reviews.text: wonderful little squishy stress ball. Smells like fresh cream and marshy mallows. I recommend it for kids, teens, or adults. I am an adult and this was for me. I also ended up buying this after I had bought a jumbo squishy lamb.
customer_reviews.author: Cassette J

customer_reviews.title: Stress ball alternative? I say yes!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loved it! She stresses out alot specially during her pregnancy and her aunt recommended her to get a stress ball.. So I found this cute since she likes pandas and it's squishy lol.. Yes it's not a stress ball but it works as one for her and on top of that it puts a smile in her face! :) Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Akcent13

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Huge squishy My child LOVES this product! Given the obvious that shopping online bestows, not knowing the true size/quality, we were pleasantly surprised! It is very squishy, image quality exactly as seen online, and huge! We love it. Thank you for providing such excellent product at an ideal price. -Extremely satisfied squishy customer.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great and didn’t break down like some of the other squishies
customer_reviews.author: Jholl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome squishy
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and squishy! My daughter loves it so I got another one with rainbow color
customer_reviews.author: Tamanna_786

customer_reviews.title: Best Squishie Ever!
customer_reviews.text: My panda came in just two days! It looked just like the picture. It is definitely worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: Cliftons

customer_reviews.title: Strawberry Candy
customer_reviews.text: I've kept this little panda at my desk in my office. It's super cute, keeps stress away. My coworkers have even borrowed it and used it. We played catch with it at one point. It gets dirty really quick, but it smells almost like strawberry candy :)
customer_reviews.author: MarianaPB

customer_reviews.title: It came apart on the day it was given
customer_reviews.text: Very cute cut one would think kids play with these and it shouldn't come apart by the ears the same day it's given. Disappointed in this item it was a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Pyoko

customer_reviews.title: Subpar quality
customer_reviews.text: First off, this smells delicious! I wish I could bottle the scent. Mr. Panda is very cute, but he is very rough around the edges (literally) he also doesn't squish very well. I'm neither pleased nor disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: witchi

customer_reviews.title: Large, Super Squishy, My Grand Daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my Grand Daughter. It is quite big. Super Squishy. She loves it. Not very durable, its already getting small tears and some of the color is rubbing off. But She does love it!
customer_reviews.author: Beth CochranTop Contributor: Fashion Design

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for the money you spend. Doesn’t smell awful like some squishy. My 7 year old and 1 year old both love playing with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big and super cute
customer_reviews.text: We really like the panda, it's bigger than expected and super cute! Was disappointed with the carrier. You as the seller need to switch to the USPS, it would have made it to me on time.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Greenwell

customer_reviews.title: Ears popping off
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had this for about a week and the ears are about ready to rip right off... she’s 7, so she’s not a small child who is being aggressive with it. Just squeezing it.
customer_reviews.author: Monique S.

customer_reviews.title: nice gift
customer_reviews.text: my granddaughter ordered this item. she was so thrilled with it thats all she talked about for weeks
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Kilby

customer_reviews.title: Not slow rising!
customer_reviews.text: It was big and cute but smells bad. The panda itself isn't round like in the picture, mine got a flat head and some defects.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: My grandson LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my grandson who loves pandas and 'squishies' and he absolutely loved it. He told me it was 'perfect'!
customer_reviews.author: Nita Helping Hand

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered many squishies in the past from various providers..... after my 5 y/o and my 10 y/o use, they usually last about three to four days; however these have been awesome holding onto their shape and squishiness if there is such a word ... happy with the product would definitely be ordering in the future
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but defective
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute and it smells great but it is a fast Riser not a slow Riser and its ear was ripped
customer_reviews.author: Camf28

customer_reviews.title: Coming apart
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived and is coming apart at the seams. I purchased this for my daughter for Christmas. Now I have to wait on a replacement. I will update if replacement item is any better.
customer_reviews.author: J Rickman

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived within expected time frame. Brand new condition, Soft and without irregularities. No obvious odors.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Okish
customer_reviews.text: It smells great, but the squish is mediocre at best. The one I received had a bunch of air pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Owens

customer_reviews.title: Color was off
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter. The one we got was gray and a bit dirty looking. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderlust Addict

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but did not smell like cream
customer_reviews.text: This is a large and super cute squishy panda, kids loved it but smells of plastic not cream. Super soft and returns to it's shape quickly.
customer_reviews.author: C F

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Came in faster than expected my granddaughter is very delighted they have this new edition to her squeezie collection. This one is absolutely adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my daughter's best friend. It is the cutest squishy and HUGE
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's best friend. It is the cutest squishy and HUGE! We bought different ones for my daughter, but they weren't as big as this one. We ended up ordering another for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: PharmDMom

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible it was fast rising the squishy was squished and now won't rise back up I had hope for this item never buying form here ever I want a refund for this
customer_reviews.author: Yeetyeetmcgee😂

customer_reviews.title: Durable and cute
customer_reviews.text: Good price, Nice détail and it us durable. My daughter has had some of these break or fade quick but not this one.
customer_reviews.author: dannyjoetener

customer_reviews.title: Squishy fun
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my grand daughter and it is exactly what she wanted
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Saw lots of mixed reviews but mine was perfect 🙂 no defects, slow rise after squeeze - paint scrapes off a little each time, but I feel that is to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amandy

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The panda is lovely. Anyway, I bought two of them, it can be damaged when it arrive. So can be not very safe to take it as a gift. Personally, I don't like the scent but is only my taste because is quite delicate. Overall it's nice and my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift for my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and nice size. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Marine Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great squishy!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old daughter loves this jumbo squishy! It's well made and slow rising. She even likes the scent but I think it's a bit chemically trying to be sweet. Overall very good product. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Savada

customer_reviews.title: Too cute. Great for pics...
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my google maps photos as an identifier. They are so cute and soft.
customer_reviews.author: K Cross

customer_reviews.title: Squished...permanently
customer_reviews.text: This panda bear squishy is just as squishy as advertised, which is why my daughter wanted it. Unfortunately, it arrived with a face that was creased and folded and does not expand to its rounded shape. We assumed that the folds were a result of packaging and would dissipate over time, but that hasn't happened. Frustrating, as buying junk invariably proves to be, I feel worst for the disappointment of the child who is stuck with a deformed and spoiled toy.
customer_reviews.author: Hike Wilds

customer_reviews.title: Not very slow rising at all
customer_reviews.text: My squishy arrived in fantastic condition, although it was barley slow rising. It wasn't soft and also it wasn’t very slow rising. It’s very cute and I will use it as decoration on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly1331

customer_reviews.title: Great toy great stress reliever
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for me but we recently was adopted by a stray kitten that cuddled on top of it and took a nap. Kitten loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Holly J. Mattson

customer_reviews.title: Happy owner
customer_reviews.text: Feels like playing with a non-powdery non-sticky gigantic marshmallow that has a slight sweet smell! So happy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wood

customer_reviews.title: This is very cute and a good size.
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my daughter and she Love it, She collects them and she was very happy I brought her it.some of them come crack but this one had no cracks in it, Very nice made,
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Richards

customer_reviews.title: Very dense squish
customer_reviews.text: Very big panda and it has a very nice (dense) squish
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Stuber

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves hers and uses it as a stress reliever.
customer_reviews.author: J Woody

customer_reviews.title: This product was pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This product was pretty good but it started to crack and there’s a bunch of holes in it but it lasted for a little while so it’s OK
customer_reviews.author: Megan Koronik

customer_reviews.title: BEST SQUISHY EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: This squishy was very big and jumbo. Definitely worth the price! The color and detail stays on and it smells so good! It smells like berries! It is sooo slow rising! And very cute too! You should definitely buy this product! This is the best squishy I have ever bought!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie A. Foster
